alert.note: Alert for Coastal Lee; Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:51PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lee County through 730 PM EDT... At 651 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Villas to near Three Oaks to 7 miles west of Big Corkscrew Island. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Bonita Springs, San Carlos Park, McGregor, East Dunbar, Pine Manor, Lovers Key State Park, Southwest Florida Airport, Harlem Heights, Iona, Cypress Lake, Villas, Three Oaks, Whiskey Creek, Page Park, Page Field Airport, Punta Rassa, Fort Myers Villas and Estero. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
